sense.gloss: to get out of shape, to lose one's shape, to become disorganized, to become untidy
to break down, to be thrown into disarray
to crash (stock market), to slump, to decline
to break money into small change
to turn bad (e.g. weather), to change for the worse, to deteriorate

sdata.j: ↑彼↑↓かれ↓は↑彼女↑↓かのじょ↓の↑足元↑↓あしもと↓に↑崩↑↓|くず↓れる|ように↑倒↑↓たお↓れた。
↑彼女↑↓かのじょ↓は↑床↑↓ゆか↓に↑崩↑↓|くず↓れる|ようにして↑倒↑↓だお↓れた。
sdata.e: She fell in a heap to the floor.

sdata.j: ↑来週↑↓らいしゅう↓↑天気↑↓てんき↓が|くずれる|ことはないでしょう。
sdata.e: I do not believe the weather will change for the worse next week.

sdata.j: ↑来週↑↓らいしゅう↓↑天気↑↓てんき↓が|くずれる|ことはないでしょう。
sdata.e: I don't believe the weather will change for the worse next week.

sdata.j: イメージが↑崩↑↓|くず↓れる|から、しゃべらない↑方↑↓ほう↓がいいよ。
sdata.e: You should just stop talking. You're only going to make yourself look worse.

sdata.j: ↑帽子↑↓ぼうし↓をかぶると↑髪型↑↓かみがた↓が↑崩↑↓|くず↓れる|から↑嫌↑↓いや↓なのよ。
sdata.e: I don't like wearing hats because it messes up my hair.

sdata.j: ↑帽子↑↓ぼうし↓をかぶると↑髪型↑↓かみがた↓が↑崩↑↓|くず↓れる|から↑嫌↑↓いや↓なのよ。
sdata.e: My hair style gets ruined whenever I wear hats, so I don't like them.
